about_the_game:
Did you really believe that Forgotten Hill has regular pieces of furniture like anywhere else? Of course not. Open the Wardrobe and uncover the mysteries lurking inside!

Forgotten Hill: The Wardrobe is a first-person, point-and-click adventure that immerses you in a dark and twisted world full of puzzles, riddles, and enigmatic secrets. Delve into the unsettling town of Forgotten Hill and uncover the gruesome truths hidden behind its grotesque facade.

This game offers 5 uniquely crafted chapters that take you deeper into the dark secrets and strange powers of The Wardrobe.

Other Friends: It might not always be true that those who find a friend find a treasure...
Two Sisters: Even the most perfect worlds are rarely what they appear to be.

Together Once More: No matter how lonely or abandoned you may feel, trust should never be given lightly—especially not to a voice from beyond.

The Price of a Smile: Confront your darkest moral dilemmas, face chilling consequences, and discover how far your greed will take you.

Dark Mechanics: Explore the the most hidden recesses of the Wardrobe to finally found out if it's possible to get rid of its evils

The Crafting: The exclusive chapter zero, where we'll find out how everything began...

  • Expand the Forgotten Hill Universe: Meet new and familiar faces while discovering new layers of the eerie lore that defines Forgotten Hill.

  • Test Your Wits: Encounter a wide variety of original puzzles and riddles that will challenge your logic and keep you thinking.

  • Immerse Yourself in the Grotesque: Experience the unsettling atmosphere of Forgotten Hill through its distinctive and haunting visual style.

  • Play in Your Language: Enjoy a fully localized experience with text and dialogues available in 8 languages.

  • Never Get Stuck: Use our exclusive hint system to get helpful nudges whenever you need them—no more frustrating dead-ends!

Step into a new adventure filled with fresh characters, clever puzzles, a newly designed UI, and the same spine-chilling, grotesque atmosphere that only Forgotten Hill can deliver.

content_descriptors.notes: This game has a horror atmosphere and includes some scenes of moderate fantasy violence and blood.
